dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: I've already sent a team ahead to scout the press. One of our best. Meet them there and find out if they've been successful.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: You sent the Van Noys there, didn't you? For fuck's sake, Graham! We needed them in the ruins! Our people died out there!

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: They went willing to fight for our cause. We need reinforcements. We need new recruits. The Van Noys saw the printing facility with the same importance as I.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Spreading the word has to be priority number one. Otherwise how can this movement grow?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You could have sent them after backing Zora up, right?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Do you two ever stop bickering?

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: Exactly. I'm glad you see the truth of the matter, Captain.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm sure the dead understand, right?

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Look, just... if the Van Noys are still alive, get them out of there. With Sanjar pressing the issue like this, I have a feeling we'll need them.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yes! You're damn right he could have, but he's so obsessed with preaching that he's become blind to our actual problems!

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: This is worth bickering over. The Iconoclasts can't keep their heads in the ground forever, or they're going to starve and die slow.
